author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: 25-year-old placed in induced coma after lab lost his test sample
description: 'My son is healthy, no pre-existing conditions and he's 25 – this virus is really dangerous and now he is very, very sick'
content:
A 25-year-old from New Jersey is an induced coma after his treatment was delayed when a lab lost his coronavirus test sample.
Jack Allard has been on a ventilator in an induced coma for six days in a hospital in Edison, New Jersey.
Mr Allard works for the B… [+2737 chars]
